title: Did Amy Connie Barrett reverse the decision that the prison guard pay compensation for the rape of a prisoner?
subtitle: The law "Does not make public employers free insurance against all errors," a panel of three judges held in a case involving sexual assault by the prison guard.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Amy Connie Barrett reversed the decision of the court of first instance; and her decision to hold the prison guard responsible for paying compensation to a prisoner who had raped her on several occasions.
